extension.name: Ultimate Social Elements (JSDK) (by web-expert.gr)
extension.author: Stergios Zgouletas
extension.description: This plugin adds Facebook's,Google,Twitter etc Javascript code to your site with autoLoad option!

field.name: apiid
field.label: Facebook API ID
field.description: Create API read the PDF.If empty you should use the iframe Mode

field.name: langfb
field.label: FB Default Locale
field.description: Greek is el_GR. Read PDF documentation how to found your locale

field.name: asyncjsdk
field.label: Enable Facebook Asynchronous
field.description: Asynchronous JSDK code is loaded after the page load

field.name: jsloading
field.label: Social Buttons Javascript
field.description: If Buttons Javascript code it's already on your source code, it will not load it again

field.name: autodetect
field.label: AutoDetect Site Language
field.description: Get locale from active language (joomfish supported).If disabled then will use the Default Locale

field.name: loadtype
field.label: Place JS Code:
field.description: Choose where you want the code to be added
